dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HJ 117 IH: Relating to a national emergency by the President on July 30, 2025.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Meeks (for himself, Ms. Kamlager-Dove, Mr. Castro of Texas, Mr. Stanton, and Ms. Titus) submitted the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: Relating to a national emergency by the President on July 30, 2025.

section.text: That pursuant to section 202 of the National Emergencies Act (50 U.S.C. 1622), the national emergency declared by the finding of the President on July 30, 2025, in Executive Order 14323 (25 Fed. Reg. 14896), is hereby terminated.
